title: Hi,
text:
I am Chengkun, currently a PhD student at the University of Helsinki, supervised by Luigi Acerbi. My research focuses on Bayesian posterior computation, namely, \[p(\text{parameters})p(\text{data}|\text{parameters}) \rightarrow p(\text{parameters}|\text{data}),\] exploring an alternative path other than direct MCMC sampling and variational inference. I used to work on computer vision and robotics too.

About the site
This website is a personal initiative to encourage more writing, both as a tool for memory retention and to deepen my understanding of reality. As Richard Feynman once said:

What I cannot create, I do not understand.



Contact
Feel free to reach me via email: sjtulck@gmail.com. ðŸ˜‰
